content.question: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, the fraction x squared over 4, end fraction, d x, equals" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction x over 2, end fraction, plus C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction x cubed over 12, end fraction, plus C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>12</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction x cubed over 4, end fraction, plus C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 3 x cubed over 4, end fraction, plus C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>
